Version 3.0 (2012-02-15)
  Use version 3.0.0 of Ar-PHP.org classes

Version 2.1 (2009-03-15)
  Use version 2.6 of Ar-PHP.org classes; Utilize Um-Al-Qoura correction for Hijri date.

Version 2.0 (2009-09-10)
  Use version 2.5.2 of Ar-PHP.org classes (much better performance and more less memory usage), and add Arabic text standardization button, also we exclude unused class from that library.

Version 1.1 (2009-02-12)
  Use latest version of Ar-PHP.org classes (much better performance and more less memory usage).


Version 1.0.1 (2008-08-17)
  Add GPL license notation as well as my reference to this TinyMCE plugin.
  TinyMCE plugin will return now notice message refer to PHP needs if there is no PHP support.
  Add blank index.html file in the TinyMCE plugin directory and sub directory.
